Description:
Premier Position in the Pasadena Estate!
If you have been looking for a quality property situated in the Pasadena Estate in Clyde North, then look no further than this beautiful brand new townhouse.
This stylish three bedroom open plan home features a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, study nook, powder room, European style laundry, low maintenance back garden and direct access from the garage.
This home has the benefit of a quiet lifestyle offering a future golf course, walking distance to Casey Fields and Casey Race, beautiful parks and shopping precinct within walking distance, plus only minutes to Cranbourne's town centre. Contact our friendly team for your private inspection.
Insights: 8 Sticht Way, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2015 and 43 other 3 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Land Ahoy!
Fantastic home site nestled between two parks and just a brisk walk to a brand new Pasadena shopping complex. Surrounded by quality homes, it is the last of the blocks in the family friendly suburb and only a few minutes' drive to sports leisure centre and great new shopping centres.
Site is almost 32x11mtr (approx).
Be quick, it won't last at this price!
Call Leon D'Penha now on 0415 205 032!

Description:
12 MONTHS OLD PASADENA ESTATE
Here it is, established but like brand new (only 12 months old). 4 bedrooms, master with full ensuite & walk in robe, floating timber floors, carpeted to bedrooms & lounge, ceaser stone benches & vanities, well-appointed kitchen with 5 burner gas cooker & dishwasher.
Two separate zoned living areas, ducted vacuum system plus alfresco & double garage with an auto door & internal access to home.
New shopping centre under construction, only minutes from Cranbourne & schools all close by.
Call Frank Barrett for all inspections.
Frank Barrett : 0418 800 912

Description:
DEVELOPERS TAKE NOTE 20 ACRES PRIME LAND!!
Situated on approx. 20 acre - this property is in the Urban Growth Zone and will be soon ready for development.
The property is currently surrounded by existing residential developments including Selandra Rise, Blue Hills, Livingston, Parks Edge, and Pasadena Estates. This prim land is also close to shopping centres, St Peters Secondary College and St Thomas Primary School. The development is also a short drive to the Casey Fields Sporting Complex, Casey Race and indoor sports centre. To find out more about this property contact Obrien Real Estate today.

Description:
SAVE ON STAMP DUTY! READY IN 2 MONTHS! PICK YOUR COLOURS!
The builder just could not wait to start this fantastic property! The homes are built to the highest of quality and are basically built for you to move straight into or invest if you wish to! There is an endless list of inclusions on this home from...
- Heating and Cooling
- Porcelein Tiles
- Bamboo Timber Flooring
- Tiled Shower Bases
- Ceaser stone bench top in kitchen, bathroom and ensuite
- 900mm stainless steel appliances
- LED downlights
- High ceilings
- Colourbond garage door
- Feature facades and much more!
Comprising of three very spacious bedrooms all with large built in robes with a common bathroom to suit as well as a fourth master bedroom at the rear of the property which is fit for a King and his Queen with a huge walk in robe as well as a separate ensuite to service! The list goes on with an island bench over looking the family and meals area which leads out to the alfresco and backyard!
This home is fixed price with a 5/10% deposit and pay nothing till you move in! You have stamp duty savings as the house is currently at frame stage.
Get in NOW and still be able to pick your colours! Call Tim to arrange an appointment as they will not last ... 0411 989 344

Description:
Land Titled!!... Plans Drawn!! - READY TO START BUILDING!
This lovely block of land has so much potential, you can either build your dream home or build an investment property and reap the rewards! What an opportunity!!
With the land already titled and ready to go as well as the plans ready this home awaits the right first home buyer or astute investor.
Situated in stage 1 and at the front of the Pasadena Estate is this outstanding 496m2 flat vacant block of land.
The block is titled and ready to go, with a wide frontage of approx 16.6m and a depth of 30m, you will be able to build a large family home on it.
Located close to all amenities including newly built shopping centers, primary and secondary school this block of land is ready and waiting for you.
One of the few rare TITLED blocks of land in the estate so don't miss out! The land is also available for sale on its own, please enquire within.
Call Tim on 0411 989 344

Description:
128.81 ACRES OF PRIME DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITY!
Key features of the property include:
- Less than 5km from the Urban Growth Zone
- Bore S&D
- 8 Paddocks, 4 dams
- Barb wire & electric fences
- Sealed road with 850m frontage to Manks Road & 600m frontage to Tooradin Station Road
- Loading ramp with an adjoining pen which has a capacity to securely hold up to 80 cattle
Right on the door step of the ever growing Cardinia and Casey Municipality, it's only a matter of time before you can reap the rewards of this outstanding opportunity.
Casey is one of the fastest developing growth areas and by 2031 Casey is expected to accommodate around 403,314 people. Cardinia is currently growing by an average of five families a day and will house a total of 157,035 people and provide between 100,000 and 140,000 jobs.
The growth area has the added benefit of development opportunities around two electrified railway lines, as well as the Monash/Princes and South Gippsland Freeways, connecting Casey to Gippsland, Phillip Island, the Mornington Peninsula and greater Melbourne.
- 13km to Cranbourne
- 8km to Devon Meadows
- 5km to Tooradin
- 10km to Koo Wee Rup
- 20km to Pakenham
- 60km to Melbourne CBD
Call Matt Koster to secure your inspection today on 0474 781 711

Description:
Grandeur On Clyde
Showcasing some 45sqs on 3/4 acre, this exciting, immaculately kept property is awaiting your inspection. With convenient access to Berwick and Beaconsfield, with high-end schooling facilities, Monash University and extensive medical options, the location offers convenience with a private, rural aspect. Hidden behind a remote gated entry, you are greeted by established, manicured gardens - soaring Palm trees imparting an exotic ambience. The double storey floorplan is vast, offering 4 upstairs bedrooms & downstairs study. Master is luxurious, complimented by a hotel-like ensuite. All secondary bedrooms are large, and serviced by a sizeable bathroom. With three living zones, this grand home caters for your every entertaining whim. The tiled, light-filled kitchen is ideal for the chef of the home - opening out to an enormous meals space - imagine Christmas day here! Outdoors is a treat in itself - the bonus of an exterior sunroom, doubling up as a bbq or winter sun-basking room - fully fitted with high quality zip-track blinds, enclosing the room to make a 4th living space if need be. The shed is awaiting your toys and tools - a larger than double car lock-up garage and oversize carport will ensure the vehicles are safe and sound. Many an extra is included, which only an inspection will reveal! A very unique opportunity presents itself here - if you are in search of a lifestyle property in the South East corridor, this one should definitely be on your must-see list!
Kristen Turner : 0410 615 228

Address: Lot 707 Green Gully Road CLYDE VIC 3978
Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
PASADENA (201054223): **FUTURE "SHOPPING ON CLYDE" PRECINCT AND ADJOINING GOLF COURSE CLOSE BY** Searching for a tranquil location? Requiring an estate offering family friendly living? Wanting to be within a brief drive to major shopping facilities and freeway access? This is definitely affordable buying for first timers so take advantage of the Government Grants on offer and buy with confidence today!
This spacious allotment is truly a prime piece of real estate and provides the perfect foundation to create your dream home whilst enjoying the quality lifestyle on offer in Pasadena! This premium parcel measures app. 575m2 and with a frontage of app. 16m and a depth of app. 36m the land itself is relatively level and regular in shape and provides ample room for an array of styles and designs!
With a bus stop literally at your front door Stage 7 is in a sensational position only a short stroll from Pasadena Park and future Hill Farm Park with the proposed Clyde Shopping Centre and Golf Course within walking distance!
Created by well known developers Villawood, Pasadena Clyde is designed around open outdoor areas creating an innovative, greener lifestyle. A uniquely planned community, this terrific estate will cater to your every need. You will have no trouble in creating the perfect work-life balance with the extensive parkland, multiple playgrounds catering for all children's ages, interconnected walking/bike tracks and sporting grounds!
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne this sensational opportunity is only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre!
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call today before it's SELLING, SELLING ..... SOLD!
Our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and the vendor's expectations. You can view with confidence that the vendors will sell within the range with fair terms and conditions.
Needing advice from a quality local builder? Feel free to visit www.houselandhomes.com.au. They would be only too happy to assist you with creating a suitable house design for this block.

Description:
Future Development Site Opportunity
An incomparable opportunity for future residential estate (STCA) in a booming south eastern location is coming to market. Are you ready to investigate your next grand plan or sustainable development project?
This site has long term potential for the larger developer. With the Casey council plan in a review phase the timing offers you a clear window to design a suitable development that makes sense for the region and for you to capitalise on this once in a lifetime opportunity. The facts speak for themselves as this property is in a truly unique in location. Opportunities like this are rarer than rare.
The simple facts are:
Property Details
- 70 acres approx
- 2 titles
- Reasonably flat land
- Perfectly located for a future residential estate
Area Details
- Current residential developments in the close proximity to the site
- Major growth anticipated in the region with population and work based increases speculated for the next 15 plus years
- Offering the chance to build a sustainable long term development to service the already growing area (subject to local planning and approvals)
We invite you to take a moment to fully investigate the facts here and understand the future of this area is ready to explode. It makes sense and it will be sold. Get in quick while it's still affordable.
Flexible settlement terms available
Further information can be made available as requested.

Great Value Buying in Pasadena
This one year old double storey Porter Davis home is situated in popular Pasadena with a proposed Golf Course opposite and set on a low maintenance corner block.
Features include; 4 bedrooms, the main with a WIR and ensuite with double vanity. All other bedrooms are generous in size and have BIR'S. Upstairs also has a separate living zone which would be ideal as a study area. The large kitchen offers; stone bench tops, SS dishwasher, 900ml oven, walk in pantry and plenty of bench space. Offering a lounge/dining area overlooking the alfresco which is ideal for those who love to entertain! Other Features include porcelain tiles, ducted heating, ducted vac, double garage with internal entry, down lights and plenty of storage areas.
Call today to inspect this great value home. Fantastic investment or 1st home with anticipated rental return between $370- $380 per week approx.

Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
CLYDE (118039047): This sensational property is yours for the taking! With a high class of workmanship and attention to detail evident from the moment you walk through the front door, an inspection surely won't disappoint! It's simply a case of calling the removalists, unpacking and living a comfortable lifestyle!
Designed and constructed by award winning builders Porter Davis this family home offers a functional floor plan sure to be appreciated by all. The property itself is nestled on a low maintenance, yet spacious block making it the ideal package for first home buyers, growing families and anyone looking to invest or downsize!
Offering 3 true robed bedrooms, the master suite is complete with a double door entry and a walk through robe leading to the FES with dual vanities and an oversized shower with wall niche. The enclosed study can also double up as a suitable 4th bedroom, whilst the family bathroom with separate bath/shower facilities is in close proximity.
There is a spacious front lounge and the hostess kitchen, a chef's dream, is one of the main focal points. Complete with a butler's style walk in pantry, ample cupboard/storage space, an island bench with breakfast bar, stone bench tops, a feature glass splashback and quality stainless steel appliances, including a free standing 900mm oven with 5-burner cook top, glass canopy rangehood and a dishwasher. All of this and a whole lot more overlooking the separate meals zone and family room with external tri-sliding door access!
Added bonus features include Fibre Optic communication, ducted heating, quality window furnishings and floor covering throughout, whilst the appealing colour palette allows for a variety of decor options.
The stunning street scape is enhanced by the picturesque landscaping with a widened exposed aggregate driveway leading to the remote DLUG with rear walkway access and a secure porched entry!
With an overall land size of app. 420m2 there is a substantial grassed area out the back for those with kids and pets. Summer time entertaining is made easy with the extensive rear decking, stack stone garden beds and timber box seating, whilst there is bonus outdoor storage space in the side garden shed.
Created by well known developers Villawood, Pasadena Clyde is designed around open outdoor areas creating an innovative, greener lifestyle. A uniquely planned community, this terrific estate will cater to your every need. You will have no trouble in creating the perfect work-life balance with the extensive parkland, multiple playgrounds catering for all children's ages, interconnected walking/bike tracks and sporting grounds!
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne this sensational opportunity is only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, the recently constructed Casey Fields football ground and aquatic centre!
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call today before it's SELLING, SELLING ..... SOLD!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*
Our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and the vendor's expectations. You can view with confidence that the vendors will sell within the range with fair terms and conditions.
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.

Description:
New Design Large Family Lifestyle Home Located On Prestigous Property
FEATURES
• 3 Bedrooms ENS & WIR
• Kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances
• 1 Bathroom
• 3 Living Areas
• 2 Car Garage
INCLUSIONS
• Concrete driveway & paths
• TV Antenna
• Clothesline
• Letterbox
• Flyscreens
• Remote control garage door
• Quality carpets & tiles
• Class M slab
• Fixed site costs
• Fencing and Blinds allowance
Pasadena is nestled between Cranbourne and Berwick, within walking distance from several schools, close to impressive recreation facilities and a few minutes' drive from major shopping centres.
Local Amenities:-
Westfield Fountain Gateis is a popular destination offering a variety of specialty shops, department stores, restaurants and cinemas with a local shopping centre planned for right next door. Restaurants, bars and cafes line the nearby High Street in Berwick Village with other shopping options at Eden Rise and Cranbourne Centro.
Adjoining Pasadena is the proposed "Shopping on Clyde" which is set to include a medical centre, fitness centre, offices, family restaurant and specialty shops, all within walking distance of Pasadena
Transport Networks:-
Pasadena is well connected with convenient access to the city via the Monash Freeway and South Gippsland Highway.
A bus service operates along Berwick-Cranbourne Road, taking residents to Cranbourne's town centre and train station and with Berwick train station a short drive along Berwick-Cranbourne Road
Schools & Education:-
Both primary and secondary schools are within walking distance from Pasadena including Clyde Primary School, St. Peter's College (secondary) and St. Thomas (primary) opening next year.
Nearby tertiary education includes the Chisholm Institute, in Cranbourne and Berwick, and Monash University in Berwick.
Sports and Recreation
Ideally located within the sporting hub of the south-east nearby facilities include:
Casey Fields with football ovals, soccer pitches, tennis, athletics and netball facilities
Casey RACE (recreation and aquatic centre)
Clyde Cricket Ground
Casey Indoor Sports Centre offering indoor basketball, soccer, beach volleyball and more.
In addition to these existing facilities, there is a 6 hole golf course proposed for the site adjoining Pasadena.
Featuring a series of parks, walking tracks and green open spaces, all specially designed for this community, Pasadena will be the ideal place to enjoy an active and healthy lifestyle.
One of the new parks is Pasadena Park
Located in Pasadena Boulevard, 'Pasadena Park' is a beautiful central feature of this new community.
Incorporating a children's playground, barbeque shelter, seating areas and free wi-fi Pasadena Park is a great place for families to meet and mingle with neighbours and friends.
